author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FLOSSIE BRINGING GUSTY WINDS AND RAIN TO THE SOUTHWESTERN COAST OF MEXICO...
summary: ...FLOSSIE BRINGING GUSTY WINDS AND RAIN TO THE SOUTHWESTERN COAST OF MEXICO... As of 5:00 PM MST Tue Jul 01 the center of Flossie was located near 17.9, -107.1 with movement NW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 966 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FLOSSIE BRINGING GUSTY WINDS AND RAIN TO THE SOUTHWESTERN COAST OF MEXICO... As of 5:00 PM MST Tue Jul 01 the center of Flossie was located near 17.9, -107.1 with movement NW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 966 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Flossie (EP1/EP062025)
